name: Feed Pete
description:
The villages junkfood eating plant is sick and needs feeding. Feed it before poor Pete crosses the rainbow bridge.

With Junkfood.

And Popcorn.

But beware. Not everyone wants to see Pete grow!

Controls

  • Use WASD or left stick on your xinput device to walk around.
  • Use Mouse or right stick to look around.
  • Use Mouse1 or A to pick up items.
  • Use Mouse2 or X to drop items.
  • Pressing Esc or the Home button on your controller will open the ingame menu.

Credits

  • Code & Graphics: Phantom Lab, damagefilter
  • Music: Giuliano Cau

Find the source code (stripped of propritary libraries) here: https://gitlab.com/game-kombinat/ld-46-public/
